meanings.definition: Having a strong desire to achieve success or power.
meanings.sent1: She was ambitioned to become the best student in her class.
meanings.sent2: The ambitious student worked hard to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent3: Her ambitioned spirit shone brightly during the competition.
meanings.sent4: The team's ambitioned efforts led them to victory.
meanings.sent5: His ambitioned determination inspired others to follow suit.

meanings.definition: Having a particular goal or aim in mind.
meanings.sent1: With her ambitioned plan, she aimed to start her own business.
meanings.sent2: He set out with an ambitioned vision to create a better future.
meanings.sent3: The ambitioned project was a success beyond expectations.
meanings.sent4: Her ambitioned focus on the goal never wavered.
meanings.sent5: Their ambitioned dreams guided them towards success.

meanings.sent1: The ambitioned athlete trained tirelessly for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent2: She was always seen as an ambitioned individual in her pursuit of excellence.
meanings.sent3: His ambitioned efforts paid off when he won the award.
meanings.sent4: The team's ambitioned spirit lifted them to new heights.
meanings.sent5: Their ambitioned drive pushed them to overcome all obstacles.
